mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(MENU_ID) OVER() AS TOTAL_COUNT , MENU_ID , MENU_NM , MENU_DESC , INFR_MENU_YN , FILE_SIZE , MENU_DEPTH FROM ( SELECT TENANT_MENU_ID AS MENU_ID , MENU_NM , MENU_DESC , MENU_DEPTH , INFR_MENU_YN , BODY_FILE_SIZE AS FILE_SIZE , CONCAT( BODY_FILE_PATH, BODY_FILE_NM ) AS FILE_POS , EXPO_ORD FROM TB_DP_TENANT_MENU WHERE TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND SYSTEM_ID = #{systemId} START WITH TENANT_MENU_ID = #{menuId} CONNECT BY PRIOR TENANT_MENU_ID = UP_MENU_ID ) GROUP BY MENU_ID , MENU_NM , MENU_DESC , INFR_MENU_YN , FILE_SIZE , MENU_DEPTH , EXPO_ORD ORDER BY MENU_ID, MENU_DEPTH, EXPO_ORD

/* MenuCategoryMapper.xml, getMusicDetailCategoryList, JuYoungYun, 2014-01-08 */ SELECT COUNT(MENU_ID) OVER() AS TOTAL_COUNT , MENU_ID , DECODE(MENU_ID,'DP16002','TOP 뮤직',MENU_NM) AS MENU_NM , MENU_DESC , INFR_MENU_YN , DECODE(MENU_ID,'DP16003001','2',MENU_DEPTH) AS MENU_DEPTH , FILE_POS , FILE_SIZE , NVL(CAT_PROD_CNT, 0) AS MENU_PROD_CNT FROM ( SELECT C.MENU_ID , C.MENU_NM , C.MENU_DESC , C.INFR_MENU_YN , C.UP_MENU_ID , C.EXPO_ORD , C.MENU_DEPTH , C.FILE_POS , C.FILE_SIZE , DECODE( C.INFR_MENU_YN , 'Y' , SUM( P.CAT_PROD_CNT ) OVER ( PARTITION BY SUBSTR( C.MENU_ID, 0, 7 ) ) , P.CAT_PROD_CNT ) AS CAT_PROD_CNT , ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY SUBSTR( C.MENU_ID, 0, 7 ) ORDER BY C.MENU_DEPTH , C.EXPO_ORD , C.MENU_NM ) AS CAT_PRIOR FROM ( SELECT M.MENU_ID , D.MENU_NM , D.MENU_DESC , TM.EXPO_ORD , M.MENU_DEPTH , M.UP_MENU_ID , M.INFR_MENU_YN , CONCAT( TM.BODY_FILE_PATH, TM.BODY_FILE_NM ) AS FILE_POS , TM.BODY_FILE_SIZE AS FILE_SIZE FROM TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY M ,TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY_DESC D ,TB_DP_TENANT_MENU TM WHERE M.MENU_ID = D.MENU_ID AND TM.TENANT_MENU_ID = M.MENU_ID AND TM.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND TM.SYSTEM_ID = #{systemId} AND M.MENU_ID LIKE #{menuId}||'%' /* AND M.MENU_DEPTH >= 1 */ AND M.USE_YN = 'Y' AND D.LANG_CD = #{langCd} AND TM.USE_YN = 'Y' ) C , ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS CAT_PROD_CNT , C.MENU_ID FROM TB_DP_MULTIMDA_PROD MP , TB_DP_PROD P , TB_DP_PROD_RSHP SP , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD TP , TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY_PROD_MAPG CP , TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY C , TB_DP_SPRT_DEVICE SH , TB_CM_DEVICE PHI , TB_DP_CHART_PROD_MAPG MCP , TB_DP_MUSIC_CHART MCI WHERE MP.PROD_ID = P.PROD_ID AND TP.PROD_ID = P.PROD_ID AND CP.PROD_ID = P.PROD_ID AND C.MENU_ID = CP.MENU_ID AND (SP.PART_PROD_ID = P.PROD_ID OR SP.PROD_ID = P.PROD_ID) AND SH.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = PHI.DEVICE_MODEL_CD AND SH.PROD_ID = P.PROD_ID AND PHI.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelCd} AND TP.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' AND (C.TOP_MENU_ID = #{menuId} OR C.MENU_ID = #{menuId}) AND PHI.USE_YN = 'Y' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND PHI.MUSIC_SPRT_YN = 'Y' AND MCP.PROD_ID = P.PROD_ID AND MCI.MUSIC_ID = MCP.MUSIC_ID AND MCI.CHART_GENRE_CD = CP.MENU_ID AND MCP.PROD_ID = CP.PROD_ID AND MP.CONTENTS_TYPE_CD IN ('PD002501', 'PD002502') AND MP.META_CLSF_CD = 'CT25' AND MCI.CHART_CLSF_CD = 'DP004905' AND MCI.RANK_START_DAY = ( SELECT MAX(TO_CHAR(STD_DT,'YYYYMMDD')) FROM TB_DP_BATCH_COMPT WHERE TENANT_ID = 'S01' AND BATCH_ID = 'MELON_DP004905') GROUP BY C.MENU_ID UNION ALL SELECT NVL( COUNT(*), 0 ) AS CAT_PROD_CNT , 'DP16003001' AS MENU_ID FROM TB_DP_MULTIMDA_PROD_0108_01 MP , TB_DP_PROD P , TB_DP_PROD_RSHP SP , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD TP , TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY_PROD_MAPG CP , TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY C , TB_DP_SPRT_DEVICE SH , TB_CM_DEVICE PHI , TB_DP_CHART_PROD_MAPG MCP , TB_DP_MUSIC_CHART MCI WHERE MP.PROD_ID = P.PROD_ID AND TP.PROD_ID = P.PROD_ID AND CP.PROD_ID = P.PROD_ID AND C.MENU_ID = CP.MENU_ID AND (SP.PART_PROD_ID = P.PROD_ID OR SP.PROD_ID = P.PROD_ID) AND SH.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = PHI.DEVICE_MODEL_CD AND SH.PROD_ID = P.PROD_ID AND PHI.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelCd} AND TP.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' AND (C.TOP_MENU_ID = #{menuId} OR C.MENU_ID = #{menuId}) AND PHI.USE_YN = 'Y' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND PHI.MUSIC_SPRT_YN = 'Y' AND MCP.PROD_ID = P.PROD_ID AND MCI.MUSIC_ID = MCP.MUSIC_ID AND MCP.PROD_ID = CP.PROD_ID AND MP.CONTENTS_TYPE_CD IN ('PD002501', 'PD002502') AND MP.META_CLSF_CD = 'CT25' AND MCI.CHART_CLSF_CD = 'DP004904' AND MCI.RANK_START_DAY = ( SELECT MAX(TO_CHAR(STD_DT,'YYYYMMDD')) FROM TB_DP_BATCH_COMPT WHERE TENANT_ID = 'S01' AND BATCH_ID = 'MELON_DP004904') GROUP BY C.MENU_ID ) P WHERE C.MENU_ID = P.MENU_ID(+) ) WHERE MENU_ID not like 'DP16001%' AND MENU_ID <> 'DP16003' ORDER BY CAT_PRIOR

/* MenuCategoryMapper.xml, getMovieDetailCategoryList, JuYoungYun, 2014-01-09 */ SELECT COUNT(C.MENU_ID) OVER() AS TOTAL_COUNT , SUM( C.MENU_PROD_CNT ) OVER ( ) AS TOTAL_PROD_CNT , C.MENU_ID , C.MENU_NM , C.INFR_MENU_YN AS SUB_YN , C.MENU_DEPTH , C.FILE_POS , C.FILE_SIZE , C.MENU_DESC AS MENU_DESC , NVL(C.MENU_PROD_CNT, 0) AS MENU_PROD_CNT FROM ( SELECT C.MENU_ID , C.MENU_NM , C.MENU_DESC , C.INFR_MENU_YN , C.UP_MENU_ID , C.EXPO_ORD , C.MENU_DEPTH , C.FILE_POS , C.FILE_SIZE , DECODE( C.INFR_MENU_YN , 'Y' , SUM( P.MENU_PROD_CNT ) OVER ( PARTITION BY SUBSTR( C.MENU_ID, 0, 7 ) ) , P.MENU_PROD_CNT ) AS MENU_PROD_CNT , ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY SUBSTR( C.MENU_ID, 0, 7 ) ORDER BY C.MENU_DEPTH , C.EXPO_ORD , C.MENU_NM ) AS CAT_PRIOR FROM ( SELECT M.MENU_ID , D.MENU_NM , D.MENU_DESC , TM.EXPO_ORD , M.MENU_DEPTH , M.UP_MENU_ID , M.INFR_MENU_YN , CONCAT( TM.BODY_FILE_PATH, TM.BODY_FILE_NM ) AS FILE_POS , TM.BODY_FILE_SIZE AS FILE_SIZE FROM TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY M ,TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY_DESC D ,TB_DP_TENANT_MENU TM WHERE M.MENU_ID = D.MENU_ID AND TM.TENANT_MENU_ID = M.MENU_ID AND TM.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND TM.SYSTEM_ID = #{systemId} AND M.MENU_ID LIKE #{menuId}||'%' /* AND M.MENU_DEPTH >= 1 */ AND M.USE_YN = 'Y' AND D.LANG_CD = #{langCd} AND TM.USE_YN = 'Y' ) C , ( SELECT MENU_ID , SUM( MENU_PROD_CNT ) AS MENU_PROD_CNT FROM ( SELECT MENU_ID , DECODE( MENU_ID , 'DP17001' , MENU_PROD_CNT , ( CASE WHEN GRP_CD NOT IN ( 'DP003700','DP003701') THEN MENU_PROD_CNT ELSE 0 END ) ) MENU_PROD_CNT FROM ( SELECT ( CASE WHEN P.GRP_CD IN ( 'DP003700','DP003701' ) THEN 'DP17001' ELSE P.MENU_ID END ) AS MENU_ID , SUBSTR( P.MENU_ID , 0, 7 ) AS UP_MENU_ID , P.GRP_CD , COUNT(*) AS MENU_PROD_CNT FROM ( SELECT MENU_ID , GRP_CD , CONCAT( MENU_ID, GRP_CD ) CAT FROM ( SELECT CAT.MENU_ID , GRP_CD , ROW_NUMBER( ) OVER( PARTITION BY CAT.MENU_ID , CAT.CHNL_PROD_ID ORDER BY CAT.REG_DT DESC ) AS RN FROM ( SELECT C.MENU_ID , CP.PROD_ID AS CHNL_PROD_ID , SC.REG_DT , NV.ETC_CD AS GRP_CD FROM TB_DP_PROD P , TB_DP_PROD_RSHP CP , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD TP , TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY_PROD_MAPG MP , TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY C , TB_DP_SUB_CONTENTS SC , (SELECT PROD_ID , SD_VIDEO_SPRT_YN , HDV_SPRT_YN , VIDEO_DRM_SPRT_YN FROM TB_DP_SPRT_DEVICE SH , TB_CM_DEVICE PI WHERE SH.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = PI.DEVICE_MODEL_CD AND PI.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelCd} AND PI.USE_YN = 'Y') SHI , TB_DP_LIST_PROD NV , TB_DP_PROD P2 , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD TP2 WHERE P.PROD_ID = CP.PROD_ID -- CHENAL PROD AND TP.PROD_ID = CP.PROD_ID AND TP2.PROD_ID = CP.PART_PROD_ID AND MP.PROD_ID = P.PROD_ID AND MP.MENU_ID = C.MENU_ID AND CP.PART_PROD_ID = SC.PROD_ID AND CP.PART_PROD_ID = SHI.PROD_ID AND CP.PART_PROD_ID = P2.PROD_ID AND CP.PROD_ID = NV.PROD_ID AND NV.MENU_ID = MP.MENU_ID AND NV.LIST_ID = 'ADM000000003' -- 운영자추천_신규상품_영화/방송 AND C.MENU_ID LIKE #{menuId}||'%' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y' AND SC.SALE_YN = 'Y' AND DECODE( SHI.SD_VIDEO_SPRT_YN , 'Y' , DECODE( SC.DP_PG_QULT_CD , 'PD009701', 1 -- 일반화질 , 'PD009702', 1 -- 고화질 , DECODE( SHI.HDV_SPRT_YN, 'Y', 1, 0 ) ) , DECODE( SC.DP_PG_QULT_CD, 'PD009701', 1, 0 ) ) = 1 -- 일반화질 AND DECODE( SHI.VIDEO_DRM_SPRT_YN , 'N' , DECODE( NVL( P2.DRM_YN, 'N' ), 'N', 1, 0 ) , 'Y' , 1 ) = 1 AND NV.MENU_ID LIKE #{menuId}||'%' AND NV.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND P.SVC_GRP_CD = 'DP000203' -- 멀티미디어 AND P2.SVC_GRP_CD = 'DP000203' -- 멀티미디어 AND TP.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' AND TP.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND TP2.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' AND TP2.EXPO_YN = 'Y' ) CAT ) WHERE RN = 1 ) P GROUP BY P.MENU_ID , P.GRP_CD ) ) GROUP BY MENU_ID ) P WHERE C.MENU_ID = P.MENU_ID(+) ) C --- WHERE C.MENU_PROD_CNT > 0 ORDER BY C.CAT_PRIOR

/* MenuCategoryMapper.xml, getEBookDetailCategoryList, JuYoungYun, 2014-01-10 */ SELECT COUNT(MENU_ID) OVER() AS TOTAL_COUNT , MENU_ID , MENU_NM , MENU_DESC , MENU_DEPTH , INFR_MENU_YN AS SUB_YN , MENU_PROD_CNT , SUM( MENU_PROD_CNT ) OVER () AS TOTAL_PROD_CNT , FILE_POS , FILE_SIZE FROM ( SELECT C.MENU_ID , C.MENU_NM , C.MENU_DESC , C.MENU_DEPTH , C.INFR_MENU_YN , C.UP_MENU_ID , C.EXPO_ORD , C.FILE_POS , C.FILE_SIZE , DECODE( C.INFR_MENU_YN , 'Y' , SUM( P.CNT ) OVER ( PARTITION BY SUBSTR( C.MENU_ID, 0, 7 ) ) , P.CNT ) AS MENU_PROD_CNT , ROW_NUMBER() OVER ( PARTITION BY SUBSTR( C.MENU_ID, 0, 7 ) ORDER BY C.MENU_DEPTH , C.EXPO_ORD , C.MENU_NM ) AS CAT_PRIOR FROM ( SELECT M.MENU_ID , D.MENU_NM , D.MENU_DESC , TM.EXPO_ORD , M.MENU_DEPTH , M.UP_MENU_ID , M.INFR_MENU_YN , CONCAT( TM.BODY_FILE_PATH, TM.BODY_FILE_NM ) AS FILE_POS , TM.BODY_FILE_SIZE AS FILE_SIZE FROM TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY M ,TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY_DESC D ,TB_DP_TENANT_MENU TM WHERE M.MENU_ID = D.MENU_ID AND TM.TENANT_MENU_ID = M.MENU_ID AND TM.TENANT_ID = #{tenantId} AND TM.SYSTEM_ID = #{systemId} AND M.MENU_ID LIKE #{menuId}||'%' AND M.USE_YN = 'Y' AND D.LANG_CD = 'ko' AND TM.USE_YN = 'Y' ) C , ( SELECT MENU_ID , COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM ( SELECT C.MENU_ID , CP.PROD_ID AS CHNL_PROD_ID FROM TB_DP_PROD P , TB_DP_PROD_RSHP CP , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD TP , TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY_PROD_MAPG MP , TB_DP_MENU_CATEGORY C , (SELECT SH.PROD_ID , PI.EBOOK_SPRT_YN , PI.MAGAZINE_SPRT_YN , PI.COMIC_SPRT_YN FROM TB_DP_SPRT_DEVICE SH , TB_CM_DEVICE PI WHERE SH.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = PI.DEVICE_MODEL_CD AND PI.DEVICE_MODEL_CD = #{deviceModelCd} AND PI.USE_YN = 'Y') SHI , TB_DP_PROD P2 , TB_DP_TENANT_PROD TP2 , TB_DP_MULTIMDA_PROD PM WHERE P.PROD_ID = CP.PROD_ID -- CHENAL PROD AND TP.PROD_ID = CP.PROD_ID AND TP2.PROD_ID = CP.PART_PROD_ID AND MP.PROD_ID = P.PROD_ID AND PM.PROD_ID = CP.PROD_ID AND MP.MENU_ID = C.MENU_ID AND CP.PART_PROD_ID = SHI.PROD_ID AND CP.PART_PROD_ID = P2.PROD_ID AND C.MENU_ID LIKE #{menuId}||'%' AND C.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND DECODE( SHI.EBOOK_SPRT_YN , 'Y' , DECODE( PM.META_CLSF_CD , 'CT24' -- 잡지 , DECODE( SHI.MAGAZINE_SPRT_YN, 'Y', 1, 0 ) , 'CT26' -- 인터렉티브 잡지 , DECODE( SHI.MAGAZINE_SPRT_YN, 'Y', 1, 0 ) , 1 ) , 0 ) = 1
AND SHI.COMIC_SPRT_YN = 'Y'
AND P.SVC_GRP_CD = 'DP000203' -- 멀티미디어 AND P2.SVC_GRP_CD = 'DP000203' -- 멀티미디어 AND TP.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' AND TP.EXPO_YN = 'Y' AND TP2.PROD_STATUS_CD = 'PD000403' AND TP2.EXPO_YN = 'Y' ) GROUP BY MENU_ID ) P WHERE C.MENU_ID = P.MENU_ID(+) ) -- WHERE MENU_PROD_CNT > 0 ORDER BY CAT_PRIOR
